attributes.action: Give Unsold toys and clothing from Woolworths to Childrens Hospice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am starting my first petition to give unsold Woolworth toys and clothing to the children. I think that it will be a nice jesture from the all of the United Kingdom to make the children happy for their final stages of life!
We should let them smile, laugh, and cry (with happyness).

Does anyone agree?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
